1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests package¶

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.1. Submodules¶

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.2. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_DP_Hydroelasticity_tests_0 module¶

Created on Nov 5, 2018

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 3D Hydroelasticity. Checks: -Convergence -Generalised force displacement values -Steady state displacement values -Diffusion time test

class ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_DP_Hydroelasticity_tests_0.Test(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.3. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_DP_Hydroplasticity_tests_0 module¶

Created on Mai 30, 2022

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 3D Hydroplasticity with a Drucker Prager yield criterion. Check yield limit for different pressure and yielding under isochoric deformation.

Checks: -Convergence -Generalised force displacement values -Yield criterion

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.4. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_DP_Hydroplasticity_tests_1 module¶

Created on Mai 30, 2022

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 3D Hydroplasticity with a Drucker Prager yield criterion. Check softening behavior due to pore fluid pressure increase. The unit cube is under 1D compression.

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 3D Hydroelasticity. Checks: -Convergence -Generalized force displacement values

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.5. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_DP_Thermo_Hydro_plasticity_tests_1 module¶

Created on Mai 30, 2022

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 3D Thermo-Hydroplasticity with a Drucker Prager yield criterion. Check softening behavior due to pore fluid pressure increase due to thermal pressurization. The unit cube is under 1D compression.

Checks: -Convergence -Generalised force displacement values -Analytical vs numerical total stress -Final temperature and pore fluid pressure values -Rate of temperature and pore fluid pressure increase

class ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_DP_Thermo_Hydro_plasticity_tests_1.Test(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.6. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_ThermoHydroelasticity_tests module¶

Created on Nov 5, 2018

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 1D linear elasticity Checks: -Convergence -Generalised force displacement values -Analytical vs numerical total stress -Final temperature and pore fluid pressure values -Rate of temperature and pore fluid pressure increase

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.7. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_Thermo_Hydro_plasticity_tests_0 module¶

Created on Mai 30, 2022

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 3D Thermo-Hydroplasticity with a Von-Mises yield criterion. Check pore fluid pressure increase due to thermal pressurization. The unit cube is under 1D shear.

Checks: -Convergence -Generalised force displacement values -Analytical vs numerical total stress -Final temperature and pore fluid pressure values -Rate of temperature and pore fluid pressure increase

1.4.1.3.1.1.1.2.1.2.9. ngeoFE_unittests.Multiphysics.Cauchy_tests.ThreeD.Tests.Cauchy3D_Thermoplasticity_tests_0 module¶

Created on Mai 30, 2022

@author: Alexandros Stathas

Contains unit tests of ngeoFE applied to Cauchy continua in 3D elastoplasticity with a Von-Mises yield criterion. Checks: -Convergence -Generalised force displacement values -Dissipation and temperature increase
